column5: I have a friend who is thinking of going to Everson's with a group and asked if I knew anything about the lodge and lake. I don't so I told him I would ask on this message board. Any comments?? Thanks

I haven't been to Eversons. But I have fished the lake 3 times. We caught plenty of 12-18 inch walleye. But only a few larger. Pike were about the same way, tons of smaller ones but only 4 or 5 over 35"

I have gone to Everson's the past three years. I'm a pretty good friend of Rich and can provide any info you might need. E-mail me at [email protected] and I'll be more than happy to answer any questions I can.
